mapper.insert: insert into instagram (instagram_id, id, media_type, media_url, permalink, username, caption, collection_time) values (#{instagramId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mediaUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permalink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update instagram set id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, media_type = #{mediaType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, media_url = #{mediaUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permalink = #{permalink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, caption = #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, collection_time = #{collectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where instagram_id = #{instagramId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select instagram_id, id, media_type, media_url, permalink, username, caption, collection_time from instagram
